title: Is it possible to set up two OWNER Profiles on the pixel 4xl
content: I have successfully set up guest and user profiles but I wanted to have two owner profiles so that when my fiancee has the phone if it powers off it doesn't revert to my profile and lock screen upon charging and thus rendering her unable to unlock it (yes I could give her a code etc not the point )
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
